name: Eric Bowen
text: Painter, received a grant from the Royal Norwegian Ministry of Foreign Affairs for his  series The Right to Life in Peace.

name: Jagmohan Chopra
text: Former president and chairman of the All India Fine Arts and Crafts Society, and former principle of the Government College of Art, Chandigarh.

name: Meera Mukherjee
text: Sculptor, received the Padma Shri in 1992.

name: Sushant Singh Rajput
text: Film actor. Best remembered for the role of MS Dhoni in the biopic M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story, Sarfaraz in PK (film) and his debut film Kai Po Che! based on Chetan Bhagat's best seller The 3 Mistakes of My Life.

name: Om Prakash Sharma
text: Painter and honorary member of the Russian Academy of Arts, Moscow. Received the National Art Award from the Lalit Kala Akademi.

name: Arpita Singh
text: Painter, received India's third-highest civilian award, the Padma Bhushan in 2011.

name: Paramjit Singh
text: Painter and former professor in the Faculty Of Fine Arts, Jamia Millia Islamia.

name: Rajat Sood
text: Standup Comedian. Winner of India's Laughter Champion (Season 1) on Sony TV
